entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 then light after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
